profile.name: Al-Fareed
profile.overview: SDET Intern - 7 months of experience in TestVagrant
keypoints: Adept in Java,  JavaScript, and Python programming languages.
Familiarity with Java and JavaScript-based automation toolsets and frameworks.
Proficient in Java OOPs principles, Gradle, and Maven build tools.
Expert in automation tools: Playwright,  Appium, Selenium WebDriver, RestAssured.
Strong understanding of POM, and Singleton design patterns, contributing to efficient and maintainable test automation frameworks.
Experienced in Git, version control, branching, and merging.
Well-versed in creating efficient CI/CD pipelines for seamless software development.

GitHub Repo Fetcher (Python): Published python package to pypi to retrieve content from GitHub repositories using HTTPS link, branch names, and user access tokens.
Automatic Test Case Generator: Generates test cases using the url of the web page with options to choose tools and language.

QA Assistant: Analyzes the code and gives feedback to the user to refactor and improve code quality by following coding standards.
